*long and drawnout counterargument that lasts for two paragraphs, using superfluous terminology, pseudo-intelligent concepts, and mathematically oriented evidence to justify the originally irrational quote*
*cuss word*
I love you.

"A resentful explanation of why the quote is kind of correct and why you're incredibly stupid for not seeing this."

I'm sure to get many downvotes, but someone has to do it.

The irony of this thread is how everyone in the comments are now circle jerking about the circle jerks they see on the forums. 

No one here is above anyone else, but feel free to continue to pretend like you are. It amuses me.

^ 
Edgy comment about how the poster is superior to everyone and is a non-conformist. Probably has a fedora.
[fedooring intensifies]

Self aware thread stopped seeming so self aware...

Once upon a time, fedoras were kinda cool. They were hard to pull off, because you had to look really good in it.

Now everyone I know has one. I don't simply because I can't pull that kind of hat off. Or any. I don't look good in hats is what I'm getting at here.

Welcome to the world of satire.

The difference between this circlejerk and all the other circlejerks is that OP is actually spot-on.
It's called satire.  The difference between this thread and "LEE SIN IS THE MOST OP SHIT EVER CONCIEVED IN A VIDEO GAME LIEK IF YOU AGGREEE!11!" is that we're at least self aware.
Boards in a nutshell.
"Don't believe every thing you see on the interwebz" - Leonardo Elizabeth Lincoln the 3rd
This is more true than it should be.
The circlejerk of circlejerks of circlejerks.
#circlejerkception
